aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: Professional Background
aboutMe.description: Web developer specialized in creating exceptional digital experiences with over 5 years of experience in the financial and international sectors.
paragraphs: I'm a passionate web developer focused on creating intuitive, high-performance interfaces that transform complex ideas into exceptional digital experiences.
My approach combines advanced technical knowledge with a deep understanding of user experience, allowing me to develop solutions that not only work perfectly but also delight users.
With experience working in international environments and multidisciplinary teams, I adapt quickly to new challenges and bring innovative solutions to any project.

positions.description: Frontend Developer specialized in fintech building lending platforms with React, Next, Gatsby, Flutter Web & microservices. I implement comprehensive banking systems and digital financial solutions. Experienced in Agile, Jest testing & DevOps with Azure, improving conversion rates and UX with high financial security.

Fullstack Developer specialized in hospitality building scalable hotel platforms with Next.js, TypeScript & React. I implement headless CMS architecture with WordPress API, reusable components and SSR/SSG for optimized SEO. Expert in API integrations (Google Maps, bookings), performance optimization and responsive digital experiences that boost hotel conversions.

Internal systems & automation developer creating construction project management solutions and workflow digitization. I implement operational process automation, ERP/BPM systems and digital platforms.

Data analyst in COVID research implementing analytical solutions with Azure Cognitive Services for audio processing. I perform data cleaning, dataset preparation, and structural analysis of COVID patient interviews to generate evidence- based insights.
